description: Crispy, succulent chicken wings and spicy Buffalo sauce are the ultimate pairing, creating an explosion of flavours at every bite.
name: Air-fryer Chicken Wings With Buffalo Sauce Recipe | Woolworths

recipeInstructions.text: Preheat air fryer to 180°C for 3 minutes. Place chicken in a large bowl. Sprinkle over baking powder, then toss to coat. Place chicken in basket. Slide pan and basket into appliance. Set timer for 30 minutes. Cook, turning occasionally, or until golden and cooked through.
During the last 5 minutes of cooking, melt butter in a small frying pan over medium heat. Add sauces and sugar, then bring to the boil. Remove pan from heat.
Transfer chicken to a large bowl, then add hot-sauce mixture and toss to coat. Serve wings with ranch dressing, celery, radish, cucumber and snow peas.
